feed.title: For Public Consideration: [Marketcoin | MKC] A P2P Trustless Cryptocoin Exchange

entry.title: For Public Consideration: [Marketcoin | MKC] A P2P Trustless Cryptocoin Exchange
entry.summary: Max has proposed a P2P trustless cryptocoin exchange and is seeking feedback. He has provided a link to the proposal on bitcointalk.org and welcomes any insights from interested individuals. Max mentions that he does not have anyone to bounce ideas off, so he hopes to receive constructive criticism from others.
